C

Command - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is the command class of "Desert Adventure" This class takes the commands from the user and recognizes them as either vaild commands, or UNKNOWN commands.
Command(CommandWord, String) - Constructor for class Command
Create a command object.
CommandWord - Enum in <Unnamed>
Representations for all the valid command words for the game along with a string in a particular language.
CommandWords - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the commandWords class of "Desert Adventure" This class contains an enumeration of the commands that can be used by the user.
CommandWords() - Constructor for class CommandWords
Constructor - initialise the command words.

P

Parser - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the parser class of "Desert Adventure" This class is used to take the inputs from the user and interpret them as "adventure" commands.
